info.title: Companies House Public Data API
info.description: An API suite providing read only access to search and retrieve public company data

get.description: Get the current address of a company

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: Company number for registered office address

links.description: Links to the related resources

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

postal_code.description: The postal code e.g CF14 3UZ.

get.description: Get the basic company information

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: The company number of the basic information to return.

accounting_reference_date.description: The Accounting Reference Date (ARD) of the company.

month.description: The Accounting Reference Date (ARD) month.

made_up_to.description: The date the last company accounts were made up to.

type.description:
The type of the last company accounts filed.  
 For enumeration descriptions see `account_type` section in the [enumeration mappings](https://github.com/companieshouse/api-enumerations/blob/master/constants.yml).

next_due.description: The date the next company accounts are due.

next_made_up_to.description: The date the next company accounts should be made up to.

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the company accounts are overdue.

annual_return.description: Annual return information. This member is only returned if a confirmation statement has not be filed.

last_made_up_to.description: The date the last annual return was made up to.

next_due.description: The date the next annual return is due. This member will only be returned if a confirmation statement has not been filed and the date is before 28th July 2016, otherwise refer to `confirmation_statement.next_due`

next_made_up_to.description: The date the next annual return should be made up to. This member will only be returned if a confirmation statement has not been filed and the date is before 30th July 2016, otherwise refer to `confirmation_statement.next_made_up_to`

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the annual return is overdue.

can_file.description: Flag indicating whether this company can file.

confirmation_statement.description: Confirmation statement information (N.B. refers to the Annual Statement where type is registered-overseas-entity)

last_made_up_to.description: The date to which the company last made a confirmation statement.

next_due.description: The date by which the next confimation statement must be received.

next_made_up_to.description: The date to which the company must next make a confirmation statement.

overdue.description: Flag indicating if the confirmation statement is overdue

jurisdiction.description: The jurisdiction specifies the political body responsible for the company.

company_number.description: The number of the company.

date_of_creation.description: The date when the company was created.

date_of_cessation.description: The date which the company was converted/closed, dissolved or removed. Please refer to company status to determine which.

has_been_liquidated.description: The flag indicating if the company has been liquidated in the past.

has_charges.description: The flag indicating if the company has any charges.

is_community_interest_company.description: The flag indicating if the company is a Community Interest Company.

country.description: Country in which company was incorporated.

name.description: Identity of register in country of incorporation.

registration_number.description: Registration number in company of incorporation.

governed_by.description: Law governing the company in country of incorporation.

company_type.description: Legal form of the company in the country of incorporation.

is_a_credit_finance_institution.description: Is it a financial or credit institution.

get.description: Search companies, officers and disqualified officers

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The term being searched for.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The number of search results to return per page.

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: The index of the first result item to return.

total_results.description: The number of further search results available for the current search.

start_index.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

items_per_page.description: The number of search items returned per page.

kind.description: The type of search response returned.

items.description: The results of the completed search. See `items.kind` for details of each specific result resource returned.,

title.description: The title of the search result.

address_snippet.description: A single line address. This will be the address that matched within the indexed document or the primary address otherwise (as returned by the `address` member).

links.description: The URL of the search result.

self.description: The URL of the resource being returned by the search item.

description.description: The result description.

snippet.description: Summary information for the result showing additional details that have matched.

matches.description: A list of members and arrays of character offset defining substrings that matched the search terms.

title.description: An array of character offset into the `title` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `title` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `snippet` that matched the search terms. The first character of the string is index 1.

address_snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `address_snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `address_snippet` that matched the search terms.

kind.description: The type of search result. Refer to the full resource descriptions [CompanySearch resource](api/docs/company/company_number/CompanySearch-resource.html)  [OfficerSearch resource] (api/docs/company/company_number/OfficerSearch-resource.html) and [DisqualifiedOfficerSearch resource](api/docs/company/company_number/DisqualifiedOfficerSearch-resource.html) for the full list of members returned.

description_identifier.description: An array of enumeration types that make up the search description. See search_descriptions_raw.yaml in api-enumerations

address.description: The address of the company's registered office.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

postal_code.description: The postal code e.g CF14 3UZ.

parameters.name: restrictions
parameters.description: Enumerable options to restrict search results. Space separate multiple restriction options to combine functionality. For a "company name availability" search use "active-companies legally-equivalent-company-name" together.

total_results.description: The number of further search results available for the current search.

start_index.description: The index into the entire result set that this result page starts.

description.description: The result description.

snippet.description: Summary information for the result showing additional details that have matched.

address_snippet.description: An array of character offset into the `address_snippet` string. These always occur in pairs and define the start and end of substrings in the member `address_snippet` that matched the search terms.

description_identifier.description: An array of enumeration types that make up the search description. See search_descriptions_raw.yaml in api-enumerations

get.description: Search for a dissolved company

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The company name being searched for

parameters.name: search_type
parameters.description: Determines type of search. Options are alphabetical, best-match, previous-name-dissolved

parameters.name: search_above
parameters.description: The ordered_alpha_key_with_id used for alphabetical paging

parameters.name: search_below
parameters.description: The ordered_alpha_key_with_id used for alphabetical paging

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The maximum number of results matching the search term(s) to return with a range of 1 to 100

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: Used in best-match and previous-name-dissolved search-type

company_name.description: The company name associated with the dissolved company

company_number.description: The company number of the dissolved company

ordered_alpha_key_with_id.description: The alphakey with it's id associated with the dissolved company

date_of_cessation.description: The date that the company was dissolved

date_of_creation.description: The date that the company was incorporated

registered_office_address.title: Registered Office Address
registered_office_address.description: This will only appear if there are ROA details in the company record

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address e.g Crown Way

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address

locality.description: The town associated to the ROA e.g Cardiff

postal_code.description: The postal code e.g CF14 3UZ

company_number.description: The company number of the dissolved company

get.description: Get details of an individual beneficial owner

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: The company number of the beneficial owner details being requested.

parameters.name: psc_id
parameters.description: The id of the beneficial owner details being requested.

notified_on.description: The date that Companies House was notified about this beneficial owner.

ceased_on.description: The date that Companies House was notified about the cessation of this beneficial owner.

date_of_birth.description: The date of birth of the beneficial owner.

day.description: The day of the date of birth.

month.description: The month of date of birth.

year.description: The year of date of birth.

name.description: Name of the beneficial owner.

name_elements.description: A document encapsulating the seperate elements of a beneficial owner's name.

forename.description: The forename of the beneficial owner.

other_forenames.description: Other forenames of the beneficial owner.

surname.description: The surname of the beneficial owner.

links.description: A set of URLs related to the resource, including self.

statement.description: The URL of the statement linked to this beneficial owner.

nationality.description: The nationality of the beneficial owner.

address.description: The service address of the beneficial owner. If given, this address will be shown on the public record instead of the residential address.

address_line_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_line_2.description: The second line of the address.

country.description: The country. For example, United Kingdom.

postal_code.description: The postal code. For example CF14 3UZ.

get.summary: List the company persons with significant control statements
get.description: List of all persons with significant control statements

parameters.name: company_number
parameters.description: The company number of the persons with significant control statements list being requested.

parameters.name: items_per_page
parameters.description: The id of the legal person with significant control details being requested.

parameters.name: start_index
parameters.description: The offset into the entire result set that this page starts.

parameters.name: register_view
parameters.description:
Display register specific information. If register is held at Companies House and register_view is set to true, only statements which are active or were withdrawn during election period are shown. Accepted values are: -`true`  
 -`false`  
 Defaults to false.

items_per_page.description: The number of persons with significant control statements to return per page.

items.description: The list of persons with significant control statements.
